lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qau skl iniD pUrn smuMdR ibKY hMs mrjIvw inhcY pRswdu pwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Tau Sakal Nidhi Pooran Samoundr Bikhai , Hans Marajeevaa Nihachai Prasaadu Paavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as treasures of pearls and diamonds are found in the sea, but only a seasoned evaluator of these precious stones who can dive deep into the bottom of sea can surely enjoy the pleasure of picking them up from there.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy prbq hIrw mwnk pwrs isD Knvwrw Kin jig ivKy pRgtwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Parabat Heeraa Maanak Paaras Sidha , Khanavaaraa Khani Jagi Vikhay Pragataavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as mountains have diamonds, rubies and philosopher stones those can purify metals into gold, but only an adept excavator can bring them out before the world.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy bn ibKY milAwgr sODw kpUr soD kY subwsI subws ibhswvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Ban Bikhai Maliaagar Saudhaa Kapoora , Sodh Kai Soubaasee Soubaas Bihasaavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a jungle has many aromatic trees like sandalwood, camphor etc., but only a perfumery expert can bring their fragrance out.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gurbwnI ibKY skl pdwrQ hY joeI joeI KojY soeI soeI inpjwvhI ]546]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Gurbaanee Bikhai Sakal Padaarad Hai , Joee Joee Khojai Soee Soee Nipajaavahee ?546?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly Gurbani has all the precious items but whosoever would search and research them, he would be rewarded with those items that he so fondly desires.  (546)
